Package dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - is the type of the Model class - Client, Product, WarehouseOrder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public abstract class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Implements CRUD methods for instances of the Model classes and their corresponding elements in the database, through reflection. The SQL queries are also generated dynamically through reflection.

  • Method Details

    • findByField

      public T findByField​(java.lang.Object field, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Finds the first object that meets the condition fieldName = field in the database, in the corresponding table.
      Parameters:
      field - is the value used for filtering the data
      fieldName - is the name of the table column where field will be looked for
      Returns:
      the first occurrence of the object of type T in its corresponding database table, null if there is no occurrence

    • insert

      public void insert​(T item)
      Inserts the given item into the corresponding table in the database. Ignores static fields.
      Parameters:
      item - is the item to be inserted into the database

    • findAll

      public java.util.List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all objects in the corresponding table of the type T that have not been marked as deleted.
      Returns:
      a list of all non-deleted objects in the database table

    • delete

      public void delete​(java.lang.Object field, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Marks all rows where fieldName = field as deleted.
      Parameters:
      field - the value to be tested against all the values in the fieldName column
      fieldName - name of the specific column in the database table

    • wipe

      public void wipe()
      Permanently deletes (using DELETE) all the rows marked as deleted.

    • createSelectQuery

      private java.lang.String createSelectQuery​(java.lang.String fieldName)
      Generates a single-field test query that also skips all rows marked as deleted.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - is the field/column name to be tested.
      Returns:
      t

    • createDeleteQuery

      private java.lang.String createDeleteQuery​(java.lang.String fieldName)
      Forms a single-field test query that updates the deleted column to 1 (true).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - is the field/column name to be tested.
      Returns:
      the generated delete query

    • createInsertQuery

      private java.lang.String createInsertQuery​(java.lang.reflect.Field[] fields)
      Forms a T-specific insert query for all the values in the table.
      Parameters:
      fields - contains all of Ts fields
      Returns:
      the generated insert query

    • createObjects

      private java.util.List<T> createObjects​(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
      Converts a ResultSet into a List of T-type objects
      Parameters:
      resultSet - is the ResultSet to be converted
      Returns:
      List of T-type objects obtained from the ResultSet
